department: Department of Energy Science and Engineering
name: ESL390 Energy Economics
description: Overlaps with: Some overlap with ESL750, MCL760 Introduction to energy sector and considerations of access, security and externality; Energy demand analysis, management and forecasting, Economics of energy supply, Energy Markets – solid, liquid, and gaseous fuels as well as electricity; Energy pricing; Economics and energy-environment interaction; Energy sector reforms, Energy sector regulations.
